New Records: The Dodgers snapped a two-game losing streak with their 8-0 victory
Key Match Events: Mookie Betts homered for the second straight night
Shohei Ohtani hit an RBI single
Jackson Merrill robbed Max Muncy with a defensive highlight
Dylan Cease struggled as the Padres' starting pitcher
Dodgers' bullpen held the Padres to seven hits and a 15-inning scoreless streak
Pre-Game Insights: Manny Machado emphasized the importance of the game with 'win or go home'
Dodgers relied on Mookie Betts and Shohei Ohtani to perform well
Post-Match Reflections: The winner would have home-field advantage in the NLCS
The Petco Park crowd hoped to see the Padres eliminate the Dodgers
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Padres won 10-2 at Dodger Stadium in a previous game with tempers flaring
